entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over southwestern sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 4 cm over southwestern sections. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
